name: Kreza's Dagger
description:
Game About:
Kreza's is the last guardian of the Round Gate she guards it with her legendary Dagger, it pierces through enemies skin, whatever they are, every slice gives the beholder a strength to fight harder.
This Game is Submitted to "My First Game Jam"

Theme:
The theme is "Heal"
my game fits because every time the player attacks the enemy,
it will heal itself.

Controls:
Arrow - Movements
Space - Jump
Q  - Attack
W - Dash ( but you can only use it when the 1st circle in the dagger lit up)
E   - Slice( but you can only use it when the 2nd circle in the dagger lit up)
R   - Dagger Fury( but you can only use it when the 3rd circle in the dagger lit up)

Devnote:
I have a Youtube Channel, I make Jam devlogs there!
Help me reach 100 subs this Year XD
Thanks for Playing!!!
